title: Debugging Assistant
description: Systematic debugging with root cause analysis
prompt:
Help debug this issue systematically:

Code:
[PASTE CODE HERE]

Error/Issue:
[DESCRIBE ERROR OR BEHAVIOR]

Expected Behavior:
[DESCRIBE EXPECTED BEHAVIOR]

Environment:
- Language/Framework: [SPECIFY]
- Version: [SPECIFY]

Please Provide:
1. Root Cause Analysis
2. Step-by-Step Debugging Process
3. The Fix with explanations
4. Prevention Strategies
5. Test cases to verify
6. Alternative Solutions
7. Recommended debugging tools
example: Debug a React component causing infinite re-renders
